verses.verse: <S%H3605>"All<s%> the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> that I am <S%H6680>commanding<s%> you <S%H3117>today<s%> you shall be <S%H8104>careful<s%> to <S%H6213>do,<s%> that you may <S%H2421>live<s%> and <S%H7235>multiply,<s%> and <S%H935>go<s%> in and <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> [to give] to your forefathers.

"And you shall <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H1980>led<s%> you in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> <S%H2088>these<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> that He might <S%H6031>humble<s%> you, <S%H5254>testing<s%> you, to <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> was in your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> whether you would <S%H8104>keep<s%> His <S%H4687>commandments<s%> <S%H518>or<s%> not.

"And He <S%H6031>humbled<s%> you and let you be <S%H7456>hungry,<s%> and <S%H398>fed<s%> you with <S%H4478>manna<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you did not <S%H3045>know,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> did your fathers <S%H1>know,<s%> that He might make you <S%H3045>understand<s%> that <S%H3045>man<s%> does not <S%H120>live<s%> by <S%H2421>bread<s%> <S%H3899>alone,<s%> but <S%H905>man<s%> <S%H120>lives<s%> by <S%H2421>everything<s%> that <S%H3605>proceeds<s%> out of the <S%H4161>mouth<s%> of the <S%H6310>Lord.<s%>
"Your <S%H8071>clothing<s%> did not <S%H1086>wear<s%> out on you, <S%H3808>nor<s%> did your <S%H7272>foot<s%> <S%H1216>swell<s%> <S%H2088>these<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

"Thus you are to <S%H3045>know<s%> in your <S%H3824>heart<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> was <S%H3256>disciplining<s%> you <S%H9201>just<s%> as a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3256>disciplines<s%> his <S%H1121>son.<s%>
"Therefore, you shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H1980>walk<s%> in His <S%H1870>ways<s%> and to <S%H3372>fear<s%> Him.

"For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H935>bringing<s%> you into a <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> a <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H5158>brooks<s%> of <S%H4325>water,<s%> of <S%H9407>fountains<s%> and <S%H8415>springs,<s%> <S%H3318>flowing<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> in <S%H1237>valleys<s%> and <S%H2022>hills;<s%>

a <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H2406>wheat<s%> and <S%H8184>barley,<s%> of <S%H1612>vines<s%> and <S%H8384>fig<s%> <S%H8384>trees<s%> and <S%H7416>pomegranates,<s%> a <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H2132>olive<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> and <S%H1706>honey;<s%>

a <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>food<s%> <S%H3808>without<s%> <S%H4544>scarcity,<s%> in which you shall not <S%H2637>lack<s%> <S%H3605>anything;<s%> a <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> are <S%H1270>iron,<s%> and out of whose <S%H2022>hills<s%> you can <S%H2672>dig<s%> <S%H5178>copper.<s%>

"When you have <S%H398>eaten<s%> and are <S%H7646>satisfied,<s%> you shall <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> for the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> He has <S%H5414>given<s%> you.

<S%H8104>"Beware<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> you <S%H7911>forget<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> by not <S%H8104>keeping<s%> His <S%H4687>commandments<s%> and His <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> and His <S%H2708>statutes<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I am <S%H6680>commanding<s%> you <S%H3117>today;<s%>
<S%H6435>lest,<s%> when you have <S%H398>eaten<s%> and are <S%H7646>satisfied,<s%> and have <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1004>houses<s%> and <S%H3427>lived<s%> [in them],

and when your <S%H1241>herds<s%> and your <S%H6629>flocks<s%> <S%H7235>multiply,<s%> and your <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H7235>multiply,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that you have <S%H7235>multiplies,<s%>

then your <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H7311>becomes<s%> <S%H7311>proud,<s%> and you <S%H7911>forget<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> who <S%H3318>brought<s%> you out from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5650>slavery.<s%>

"He <S%H1980>led<s%> you through the <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H3372>terrible<s%> <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> [with its] <S%H8314>fiery<s%> <S%H8314>serpents<s%> and <S%H6137>scorpions<s%> and <S%H6774>thirsty<s%> <S%H6774>ground<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H369>there<s%> was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4325>water;<s%> He <S%H3318>brought<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> for you out of the <S%H6697>rock<s%> of <S%H2496>flint.<s%>

"In the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> He <S%H398>fed<s%> you <S%H4478>manna<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> your fathers did not <S%H1>know,<s%> that He might <S%H3045>humble<s%> you and that He might <S%H6031>test<s%> you, to <S%H5254>do<s%> <S%H3190>good<s%> for you in the <S%H3190>end.<s%>

"Otherwise, you may <S%H559>say<s%> in your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> 'My <S%H3581>power<s%> and the <S%H6108>strength<s%> of my <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> me <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2428>wealth.<s%>'

"But you shall <S%H2142>remember<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> for it is He who is <S%H5414>giving<s%> you <S%H3581>power<s%> to <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H2428>wealth,<s%> that He may <S%H6965>confirm<s%> His <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> He <S%H7650>swore<s%> to your fathers, as [it is] <S%H1>this<s%> <S%H2088>day.<s%>

"And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> about <S%H518>if<s%> you <S%H7911>ever<s%> <S%H7911>forget<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> them and <S%H7812>worship<s%> them, I <S%H5749>testify<s%> against you <S%H3117>today<s%> that you shall surely perish.

"Like the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> makes to perish <S%H6>before<s%> <S%H6><s%> you, <S%H4480>so<s%> you shall perish; <S%H6440>because<s%> you would not <S%H3651>listen<s%> to the <S%H6>voice<s%> of the <S%H6118>Lord<s%> your <S%H8085>God.<s%>
